get.description: This API lists tags associated with a ticket.

post.description: This API removes a single tag or multiple tags from a ticket.

get.description: This API lists the five most recent tags associated with tickets.

post.description: This API adds a tag to the list of recently viewed tags. tag_id is a mandatory parameter in the API request.

get.description: This API returns how many tickets contain a particular tag.

patch.description: This API replaces a tag to the specified tag. tag_id is a mandatory parameter in the API request.

get.description: This API lists the ticket tags added in your help desk portal.ï¿½

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Key that sorts tags by a specific attribute: createdTime or count. The default sorting order is descending.

schema.description: Key that sorts tags by a specific attribute: createdTime or count. The default sorting order is descending.

post.description: This API adds a single tag or multiple tags to a ticket.

get.description: This API searches for tags added in your help desk portal.

parameters.name: searchVal
parameters.description: Search keyword related to the tag.

schema.description: Search keyword related to the tag.

get.description: This API lists tickets containing the tag specified.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Additional information related to the tickets. Values allowed are: @contacts@, @products@, @departments@, @team@, @isRead@ and @assignee@. You can pass multiple values by separating them with commas.

schema.description: Additional information related to the tickets. Values allowed are: @contacts@, @products@, @departments@, @team@, @isRead@ and @assignee@. You can pass multiple values by separating them with commas.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Key that sorts the tickets by a specific attribute: @dueDate@, @recentThread@, @createdTime@, or @ticketNumber@. The default sorting order is ascending. A - prefix denotes a descending order of sorting.

schema.description: Key that sorts the tickets by a specific attribute: @dueDate@, @recentThread@, @createdTime@, or @ticketNumber@. The default sorting order is ascending. A - prefix denotes a descending order of sorting.

data.subject: Hi. There is a sudden delay in the processing of the orders. Check this with high priority

departmentId.name: departmentId
departmentId.description: ID of the department from which the tags must be fetched

schema.description: ID of the department from which the tags must be fetched

from.name: from
from.description: Index number, starting from which the tags must be fetched

schema.description: Index number, starting from which the tags must be fetched

id.description: Tag ID of the Replacing Tag
